text: yarige tanna dusta kelasagalannu candaganisi bidalagideyo avanu avugalannu satkaryagalagiye kanuttane. Khanditavagiyu allahane tanicchisidavarannu darigedisuttane mattu taniccisidavarige saridariyannu torisuttane. Nivu avara (dhikkarigala) kuritu nondukollabedi. Avaru maduttiruva ellavannu allahanu khandita ballanu
